DVN.title: Devon Energy Says Experienced Higher Operating Costs Throughout 2023 Due To Steep Cost Inflation, And These Inflationary Pressures Could Continue In 2024
DVN.text: Feb 28 (Reuters) - Devon Energy Corp <DVN.N>::DEVON ENERGY- EXPERIENCED HIGHER OPERATING COSTS THROUGHOUT 2023 DUE TO STEEP COST INFLATION, AND THESE INFLATIONARY PRESSURES COULD CONTINUE IN 2024.DEVON ENERGY CORP - MARKET PRICE FOR CRUDE OIL IS CURRENTLY EXPECTED TO BE LOWER IN 2024.DEVON ENERGY CORP - EXPECT TO CONTINUE GENERATING MATERIAL AMOUNTS OF FREE CASH FLOW FOR 2024.DEVON ENERGY CORP - OUR 2024 CAPITAL EXPENDITURE BUDGET IS EXPECTED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $3.3 BILLION TO $3.6 BILLION.
